recipesJson.name: Trapped Peach
recipesJson.author: BigCloud
recipesJson.description:
Princess Peach got trapped between an Apple and a Strawberry.
The perfect juice for a hot sunny day!

Straight forward Peach, Fuji and Strawberry mix.
Supersweet is optional.
You can sub LA Tart & Sour by .2% FA Lemon Sicily if you want.
You can vape it right away, but Cap Juicy Peach will need a week to calm down a bit. 
It might be a bit harsh as a s&v.

I'm mixing for a few years now. Most of my mixes are based on premium juice profiles.
My recipes are remixes and not clones. In my attempts to remix these juices I'm always trying to make
it as good as, or even better than the commercial juice without the loads of sweetener these companies throw in.

Give it a try and enjoy ....................................
